data.title: NAVSEA Honors Annual Award Winners
data.meta_description: Naval Sea Systems Command recognized the 2022 NAVSEA Excellence Awards Ceremony May 4 at the Washington Navy Yard.“This is a great day for NAVSEA, recognizing the hard work that’s been done across the
data.text:
Naval Sea Systems Command recognized the 2022 NAVSEA Excellence Awards Ceremony May 4 at the Washington Navy Yard.

“This is a great day for NAVSEA, recognizing the hard work that’s been done across the Enterprise,” said Vice Adm. Bill Galinis, NAVSEA commander. “Our Navy and our country need the thoughts, ideas, and passion that you bring to work every day.”

A total of 151 individual nominations and 139 team nominations were received, with 25 individual winners and 24 team winners recognized.

Categories and winners included:

Excellence in Acquisition Award

Individual: Keith A. Vandenburgh, NUWC Division, Newport

Team: USS Hartford Engineered Overhaul (EOH) Contract Team (Nicole A. Buckler, Leigh A. Marvin, Frederick N. Friedewald, Paul K. Kang, Stephanie L. Neale, Cmdr. Adam J. Mills, Lt. Matthew G. Bangos, Lt. Cmdr. Karl R. Henke, John J. Szatkowski, Trish A. Flook, Phillip Killebrew Jr., and Melissa M. Donnelly)

Chief Information Officer Excellence Award

Individual: Dr. Dennis W. Beatty Jr, SUPSHIP Newport News

Team: NSWC Dahlgren Division NAVSEA Red Team (Derek S. Howard, John W. Jims, Sara E. Hart, Christopher L. Keener, Neil A. Carter, Kris W. Walker, Reed J. Williams, James T. Taylor, Tyler R. Perdue, Malik J. Hurt, Timothy A. Raidl, Franklin B. Pittaluga, Valeria C. Bokay, David L. Trick, and Justin A. Wasileski)

Excellence in Command Support Award

Individual: Siouzann (Suzie) R. Lende, NSWC Port Hueneme Division

Team: Naval Sea Logistics Center Material Readiness Department Data Analytics Team (Callie J. Jenkins, Alexander J. Zazwirsky, and Koby L. Gehman)

Commander’s Innovation Award

Individual: Kristina M. Haller, NSWC Carderock Division

Team: NUWC Division, Keyport Motor Generator Set Team (Joel S. Galles, Nick J. Bankus, Rebecca F. Moos, Alexander R. Read, and Derek L. Mikesell)

Excellence in Contract Management Award

Individual: Bonnie T. Nguyen, NSWC Port Hueneme Division

Team: NSWC Philadelphia Division Indefinite Delivery Indefinite Quantity Team (Melissa N. Cohen, Alaina M. Farooq, and Nicolas A. Bonowski)

Excellence in Engineering Award

Individual: Jeffrey R. Platt, MARMC

Team: Virginia Class Weld Indication Root Cause Assessment Team (Richard B. Marlowe, Mariah A. Miller, and Jason C. Cordell)

Environmental Excellence Award

Individual: Ryan J. McDuffee, NSWC Crane Division

Team: NUWC Division, Newport AUTEC Coral Mitigation Team (Natasha C. Dickenson, Frank J. McNeilly, Susan P. Findlay, Amir Kanel, and William O. Monaco)

Excellence in Facilities Engineering & Management Award

Individual: Kaylee R. Ecker, NSWC Crane

Team: MARMC Facilities Branch (Richard D. Cox, Mason N. Weems, Dana V. West, Jameson L. Myrick, Thomas J. Barnhart Jr., Donald S. Adams, Iris E. Chooran, Kevin B. Wilson, Stacy L. Kebe, Philip M. Clark, and Anthony T. Henry)

Excellence in Financial Management Award

Individual: Daniel R. Fogarty, Sea 01

Team: PEO USC LCS Program Business & Financial Management Team (Gregory Smarrelli, Cora L. Ho, Stephanie E. Gill, Deborah B. Ingram, Christine K. Tully, Erin A. Castell, and Chelsea C. Riedel)

Excellence in Human Resources Award

Individual: Eileen F. Billups, Nswc Carderock Division

Team: Waypoints Implementation Team (Patrick D. Horgan, James A. Van Dyke Jr., Dale Lantrip Jr., M. Caitlin Williams, Joe M. Willis, Nicholas R. Kossegi, Amanda Pearson, Renee M. Hume, Ian G. Roper, Shelly A. Simpson, Linda A. Hutt, Ryan P. Zavitz, Mark J. Dlugonski, and Richard D. Durkin)

Excellence in Information Technology Award

Individual: Britton T. Mcmahon, PEO Ships

Team: NSWC Corona Division Marine Ammunition Knowledge Enterprise Team (Erin N. Nadvi, Yomara Donis, Joshua N. Lynch, Luis “Cap” Capistran, Anna D. Grishchenko, Bradley J. R. Willett, Holmes B. Jackson, Jason E. Crewse, Perry K. Butts, and Matthew J. Rieth)

Excellence in Logistics Award

Individual: Jennifer C. Lamb, Nuwc Division, Keyport

Team: NSWC Port Hueneme Division AN/SPS-67 & 73 Integrated Product Team (Michael R. Royle, Carl E. Hultin III, Karl D. Campbell, Bryan J. Ruckman, Kenneth G. Schmidt, Scott T. Turner, Robert L. Whitlock, Bethany P. Winter, and Edward J. Zuchowski)

Excellence in Operations Research/Systems Analysis Award

Individual: Zachary A. Ellis, PEO USC

Team: NUWC Division, Keyport Aegis Q-70 Reclamation and Reutilization Support Team (Robert M. Brown, Robert W. Funkhouser, Lorraine J. Henry, Adam K. Wiren, Ronald W. Humphrey, and Scott W. Hall)

Excellence in Program Management Award

Individual: Capt. Cedric J. Mcneal, PEO Ships

Team: Carrier Planning Activity Team (Capt. Daniel L. Lannamann, John D. Brill, Anthony R. Stradtman, Stephen C. Vandergrifft, Michael J. Lauruska, Katrina T. Bradford, Floyd C. Jarnagin, Christopher Outerbridge, Brandy M. Wiggins, Alex F. McVeigh, Jeffrey T. Newmaster, Shane M. Sullivan, Jeffrey M. Shultz, Glen E. Harsh, Greg M. Bosco, Michael D. Lewandowski, Michael J. Wonders, and Gary D. Fauss)

Excellence in Public Affairs Award

Individual: Dr. David Sanders, NSWC/NUWC HQ

Team: Team Ships Strategic Operations Public Affairs Office Team (Colleen E. O’Rourke and Jamie E. Beasley)

Excellence in Safety Award

Individual: Dr. Kathryn E. Brown, NSWC Indian Head Division

Team: NSWC Dahlgren Division LCS Combat System Safety Team (Tom Beck, Erik W. Meyer, E. Henry Howard, Joseph Saenz, Samuel D. Lilly, and Jonathan R. Kemp)

Excellence in Science Award

Individual: Dr. Alan J. Davis, NUWC Division, Newport

Excellence in Ship Maintenance Award

Individual: Joshua B. Novak, MARMC

Team: FDRMC USS Arleigh Burke Project Team (Wilfredo Monteslasanta, Jason B. Taylor, Andres Najera, Joseph I. Binder, and Albino M. Gomez)

Excellence in Small Business Award

Individual: Maria E. Bauer, SEA 02

Team: Team Ships Small Business Team (Sharon J. Linsenmeyer and Alexandra N. Linn)

Technical Authority of the Year

Individual: Richard B. Marlowe, SEA 05

Team: SM-3 Inadvertent Power Application Hazard Assessment Team (Daryl W. Crymes, John Butz, John E. Bibel, Keith M. Deloach, Bryan L. Metts, Joseph M. Plaia, Scott R. Tanabe, Chief Petty Officer Grant J. Brandl, Bradley E. Flock, Kevin G. Stottlar, Amber D. Shampine, Mindy L. Morack, Scott R. Sackin, and Mindy Lynn W. Morack)

Excellence in Test & Evaluation

Individual: Charles A. St. Clair, NSWC Port Hueneme Division

Team: PEO Ships Expeditionary Fast Transport Autonomous Prototype Test Team (Shaun P. McElhinney, Cmdr. Katie G. Vasquez, Stephen W. Berberich, Misha J. Heard, Charles E. Hawkins IV, Stephen L. Kantz, Patrick J. Crowley, Chris S. Watson, Michael (Bubba) W. Garner, Ryan P. Brophy, and Lt. Cmdr. Erik V. DeSousa)

Mentor of the Year Award

Individual: Ronald J. Williams, NSWC Philadelphia Division

Expand the Advantage Achievement Award

Individual (Within Enterprise): Horace L. Butler, PEO Ships

Individual (Warfighter Readiness): W. Ben Ellis, NUWC Division, Keyport

Team: MARMC TSRA All the Time Readiness Get Real, Get Better Team (William M. Robinson, Joseph G. Gallagher, Elizabeth M. Salva-Clifford, Lawrence M. Gruber, Daniel R. Maduro, Alan D. Morrison, John Kropcho, Tony I. Darden, Velma M. Davenport, and Calvin J. Hill)

Joshua Humphreys Award

Individual: Dan W. Baker, NUWC Division, Keyport

ONE NAVSEA Teamwork Award

Acquisition: PEO Ships Fleet Oiler and Expeditionary Sea Base Procurement Team (Robert M. Gerstein, Amy L. Baumgardner, Marc L. Bromante, Brienne G. Lang, Samadhi Roy, Adrienne D. Stapleton, Christopher W. Covalt, Brett T. Bikowski, Jennifer A. Ede, Ryan M. Ksanznak, Ryan P. Brophy, Clinton J. Braun, and Derek M. Boltja)
